result.reason: CSV export writes passwords in cleartext without warning; XML export encrypts them but CSV format cannot — need a prominent warning dialog when exporting CSV with passwords enabled
result.approach: Add a warning label/dialog in FrmExport when CSV format is selected and 'Include Password' is checked, alerting users that passwords will be exported in cleartext; upstream maintainer agreed this is the correct approach since CSV cannot carry encryption metadata

attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"CSV export writes passwords in cleartext without warning; XML export encrypts them but CSV format cannot — need a prominent warning dialog when exporting CSV with passwords enabled","priority":"P1-security","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/UI/Forms/FrmExport.cs","mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/ConnectionSerializers/Csv/CsvConnectionsSerializerMremotengFormat.cs"],"approach":"Add a warning label/dialog in FrmExport when CSV format is selected and 'Include Password' is checked, alerting users that passwords will be exported in cleartext; upstream maintainer agreed this is the correct approach since CSV cannot carry encryption metadata"}
